email.description: must conform to common email conventions using the W3C method of email validation which is only a subset of full RFC 5322 compliance
email.error_text: Must be a valid email address.

lei.description: must be 18 characters that only contain A-Z and 0-9 followed by 2 digits
lei.error_text: Must be a valid LEI of 20 characters that only contain A-Z and 0-9 (no special characters).

simple_us_phone_number.description: must be a simple United States phone number pattern of 3 digits, followed by a hyphen, followed by 3 digits, followed by a hyphen, followed by 4 digits
simple_us_phone_number.error_text: Must be a valid phone number in the format of 555-555-5555.

tin.description: must be 2 digits, followed by a hyphen, followed by 7 digits
tin.error_text: Must be a valid TIN in the format of 12-3456789.
